name: Rich's Basketball Pro
description:
*No Ads! Rich's Basketball Pro is a simple but very addictive game. Tap and slide the ball, control the angle and power, then shoot towards the hoop.
Make baskets to win levels. You have only 3 shots to complete each level.


HOW TO PLAY:
1. Touch the screen
2. Drag the ball to change the power and angle
3. Release to shoot
